items.title: 国 (guó)
items.content:
Meaning: country, nation, state

Pinyin: guó

Stroke count: 8

This character means country or nation. It shows a bordered territory (囗) with jade (玉) inside, representing the precious land.

items.title: 汉 (hàn)
items.content:
Meaning: Chinese, Han dynasty, man

Pinyin: hàn

Stroke count: 5

This character refers to the Han Chinese people and the Han dynasty. It combines the water radical with a phonetic component.
